text: Herviella mietta is a species of sea slug, an aeolid nudibranch, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Facelinidae.MolluscaBase (2018). Herviella mietta Er. Marcus & J. B. Burch, 1965. Accessed on 2018-02-20. ==Distribution== This species was described from Eniwetok Atoll. It has been reported from Hawaii and Japan.Rudman, W.B., 2001 (May 27) Herviella mietta Marcus & Burch, 1965. [In] Sea Slug Forum. Australian Museum, Sydney. ==References== Category:Facelinidae Category:Gastropods described in 1965
title: Herviella mietta
